data.actual_result: Text is moved slightly upwards and to the right
data.expected_result: Text should be centered in the middle of the button
data.short_description: "Enable SMS" text isn't centered when on 90 zoom
data.steps_to_repro: - Enable 2FA if you don't have it enabled - Change your zoom level to 90 - Observe the "Enable SMS" button under account in settings - (You may want to use something that can count the pixels, I use ShareX)
